Name: Statuette of an oarsman
Description: The statuette represents a man sitting on a rectangular base. He wears a garment of indefinite length and a wig covering his ears, a beard is shown as a painted strip on his jaw. The body is painted red, the garment is white, the wig, beard and eyes are black. The pegged arms are lost. This may be an image of an oarsman of a model ritual boat.
